title: We overlooked Unsighted, a brilliant Zelda-style indie [Resties]
description: Unsighted appeared on consoles and PC earlier this year, but we missed it. What a mistake! Frushtick and Plante talk about this brilliant indie game that blends Zelda and Metroidvanias into something new and thrilling. In the back half of the episode, the Resties discuss their favorite new additions to Xbox Game Pass, particularly the intergalactic space exploration chill-out game, Exo One.
author: thebestiesbizemail@gmail.com (Chris Plante, Russ Frushtick)
